items.name: Potion
items.description: Restores the HP of a Pokémon by 20 points.

items.name: Hyper Potion
items.description: Restores the HP of a Pokémon by 200 points.

items.name: Awakening
items.description: Awakens a Pokémon from the sleep condition.

items.name: Paralyze Heal
items.description: Cures a Pokémon from the paralysis condition.
